ai-ja480:1.2_0: Remember the one who is Sakka,
ai-ja480:2.2_0: and the break up of the body.
ai-ja480:3.3_0: it’s better to tame you, Kassapa,
ai-ja480:4.1_0: “If I was to hang my opportunity
ai-ja480:4.6_0: they don’t let greed break me.”
ai-ja480:5.3_0: it’s better to tame you, Kassapa,
ai-ja480:6.1_0: “If I was to hang my opportunity
ai-ja480:6.4_0: I’ll serve a slave of a bondservant.
ai-ja480:6.6_0: they have no hate like me.”
ai-ja480:7.3_0: it’s better to tame you, Kassapa,
ai-ja480:8.1_0: “If I was to hang my opportunity
ai-ja480:8.3_0: doesn’t see anyone who’s unskilled in a fool,
ai-ja480:9.1_0: “Why, fool, do you think I have come?
ai-ja480:9.3_0: What fool, Kassapa, is that fool
ai-ja480:10.3_0: A bad deed is hard to travel.
ai-ja480:10.4_0: the wide opening when the mind is rightly spoken.
ai-ja480:10.5_0: They don’t know the Monastic Law,
ai-ja480:11.3_0: it’s better to tame you, Kassapa,
ai-ja480:12.1_0: “If I was to hang my opportunity
ai-ja480:12.3_0: Seeing the sage, who listens to the wise,
ai-ja480:12.5_0: The Wise One, having a fool,
ai-ja480:12.6_0: Going you would be out of affection.”
ai-ja480:13.3_0: In whom is the wise one, Kassapa,
ai-ja480:14.1_0: The wise one does not act
ai-ja480:14.4_0: is said to be rightly spoken of,
ai-ja480:15.3_0: it’s better to tame you, Kassapa,
ai-ja480:16.1_0: “If I was to hang my opportunity
ai-ja480:16.3_0: Then, at the end of the night,
ai-ja480:16.4_0: as the rising of the sun drew near,
ai-ja480:16.6_0: and the virtuous begging well in virtue,
ai-ja480:17.4_0: this is the voice of Sakka.
ai-ja480:18.3_0: it’s better to tame you, Kassapa,
ai-ja480:19.1_0: “If I was to hang my opportunity
ai-ja480:19.3_0: you won’t be angry with me;
ai-ja480:19.4_0: this is the voice of Sakka.
ai-ja480:20.2_0: nor is the nation of the body;
ai-ja480:20.4_0: So what will I see that fear?”
ai-ja480:21.4_0: this is the fear of seeing.”
